name: Bon Voyage: Hidden Objects
description:
Travel around the world and partake in the most fascinating holidays and festivals celebrated in different countries! Bon Voyage: Free Hidden Object makes hunting for hidden objects more exciting than ever. Take a grand tour around four continents. Learn incredible facts about the history and origin of the most popular holidays. Gather impressive collections of artifacts and national symbols, which are a mandatory attribute of ancient and modern cultural traditions of humanity. Good luck on your adventure!

Features:

● Get precious collections of cultural artifacts
● Enjoy 3 different hidden object game modes
● Make your way through 90 spectacular locations
● Thousands of hidden objects!
● 5 languages available: English, French, Spanish, German and Russian

Encyclopedia of adventures

There are many incredible and captivating holidays in the furthest corners of the Earth you may not know about. Bon Voyage: Free Hidden Object is your chance to get acquainted with cultural and religious phenomena of mankind. In this all-new hidden object adventure you'll witness the beauty of Cherry Blossom in Japan, experience the main events of Scottish Highland games and visit the southeastern cities of Rio de Janeiro to participate in Carnival.

Bon Voyage: Free Hidden Object comprises of 4 level packs. Visit picturesque places of North and South America, Europe and Asia. Every location is devoted to a famous event accompanied by encyclopedic articles which can help you to learn interesting facts and expand your horizons. The game is available in four languages, so it will be interesting to play in word associations and improve your vocabulary of a preferred language.

There are 3 modes of difficulty: find hidden objects from the list, look at the silhouette shapes and find items in the picture, enjoy hidden object search by word associations. In order to proceed to the next chapter you need to get a unique collection of artifacts corresponding to the event. Earn various bonuses and see how high you can score in the global leader board. Excellent graphics and music create a festive mood and ignite the spirit of adventure. Bon Voyage!
